txt.en:
'It is very strange...my flock has significantly dwindled of late. I wonder where they all went off to? Very peculiar.

'I was ready to become a great Wizard, but it seems that I have one more task -- I should look to replenishing my flock. I need eggs from craban-nests, and the sooner the better, but the wild crebain that guard them can be a bit...hostile.

'You should go collect wild craban-eggs for me, [placeholder]. Make haste!'
'Ha! Perfect, [placeholder], and excellent timing, for I was beginning to grow impatient.\n\n'I am now a great Wizard, you see, and it is all thanks to you!'
'You can find craban-nests around this area, if you know where to look. The birds are wild, though! These crebain of Dunland are fierce.'
Now that you have used most of his trained flock feathers, Rook wishes to retrain a new flock, and looks for a collection of eggs to hatch.
Craban roosting spots can be found in the lands of Pren Gwydh not far from Rook's Hut.\n\nYou should search for crow-eggs so that Rook may train another flock of crebain from chicks.
Rook is at his hut in Pren Gwydh.\n\nYou should bring the eggs you collected to Rook in Pren Gwydh.
